title: ProPack Todo List
description: ProPack To Do is a task management web app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day.

title: Propack Weather-Finder App
description: Find real time weather of any city on one click and you can also see the longitude and latitude of that city at ProPack Weather Finder

title: Propack Food-Finder App
description: In this application, You can simply find your meals and see some instructions about your meal like ingredients and you can also watch a video.

title: Propack Javascript-Stopwatch
description: A basic Javascript stopwatch which allows you to count up from zero with start, reset and stop controls.

title: Propack Age Calculator
description: A basic Javascript age calculator which allows you to calculate age in days,months and years. It also wishes you on your birthday.

title: Propack Color Guessing Game
description: A basic Javascript game using rgb values the player has to guess color from given rgb value.

title: Propack Form Validation in javascript
description: A basic Javascript form validation site.

title: Propack Calculator
description: A calculator which performs the basic mathematical operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

title: Propack TicTacToe
description: A game in which two players seek in alternate turns to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O's or three X's drawn in the spaces of a grid of nine squares; noughts and crosses.

title: Propack BMI Calculator
description: A calculator which calculates body mass index using height and weight.

title: Propack Tip Calculator
description: A calculator where one can generate the amount of tip to be given to their server.
